name: Doxorubicin
description: An anthracycline antibiotic used to treat various cancers including breast cancer and leukemia.

name: Imatinib
description: A targeted therapy drug used to treat chronic myeloid leukemia (CML) and gastrointestinal stromal tumors (GIST).

name: Paclitaxel
description: A chemotherapy medication used to treat ovarian, breast, and lung cancer.

name: Letrozole
description: Used in the treatment of breast cancer in postmenopausal women.

name: Trastuzumab
description: A monoclonal antibody used to treat HER2-positive breast cancer.

name: Cisplatin
description: A platinum-containing drug used for treating bladder, ovarian, and testicular cancers.

name: Anastrozole
description: Commonly used in breast cancer treatment for postmenopausal women.

name: Capecitabine
description: An oral chemotherapy drug used to treat breast, colorectal, and gastric cancers.

name: Gemcitabine
description: Used to treat pancreatic, lung, and bladder cancer.

name: Pembrolizumab
description: An immune checkpoint inhibitor used for treating melanoma and lung cancer.

name: Bevacizumab
description: Used in the treatment of colorectal, lung, and kidney cancers.

name: Tamoxifen
description: A medication used to treat and prevent breast cancer.

name: Methotrexate
description: Used for treating leukemia, breast cancer, and head and neck cancers.

name: Erlotinib
description: A targeted therapy drug used to treat non-small cell lung cancer and pancreatic cancer.

name: Irinotecan
description: Commonly used in the treatment of colorectal cancer.

name: Vincristine
description: A chemotherapy drug used for leukemia, lymphoma, and brain tumors.

name: Sorafenib
description: A treatment option for liver, kidney, and thyroid cancers.

name: Bendamustine
description: Used to treat certain types of leukemia and lymphoma.

name: Nilotinib
description: A targeted therapy for chronic myeloid leukemia (CML).

name: Oxaliplatin
description: Used in combination with other drugs to treat colorectal cancer.
